participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and warm-hearted, Emily loves to connect with others and enjoys sharing her interests.
participant_1.background: I have a hard time opening up to my family, but my friends are my best support. I got hired last week at McDonald's. I am a genius. I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching. I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is a laid-back and cheerful guy who enjoys the simple pleasures in life, such as spending time with friends and family.
participant_2.background: I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house. I am not very fashionable but I do like to wear nice clothes on special occasions. I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise. I believe in fairytales. My mother is a dentist.

content.text: what is your favorite thing to do?
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise
I like that! I love golf too. I used to be a farmer, but I had to give it up to pursue my passion for teaching
that's awesome! I have a hard time opening up to my family, but my friends are my best support
It's the same for me! I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love
Aww that's sweet! What kind of movie do you like to watch?
I love romantic comedies and action movies!
Me too! I also like to watch classic movies. My mom is a dentist and she always makes me watch old movies with her
That's so cute! I love classic movies too. I used to watch them all the time when I was a kid
Me too! I love that they're always so heartwarming and happy
Right?! They're the best. I'm always up for watching a classic movie with you!
